title: Muppet Treasure Island
creator_credit: Walt Disney Productions, Jim Henson Productions, Martin G. Baker and Brian Henson
brief_description: The Muppets cast off for the high-seas adventure in this swashbuckling send-up of Robert Louis Stevenson’s immortal tale. Cast features Tim Curry as Long John Silver and the voices of Billy Connolly, Jennifer Saunders, Kevin Bishop, Frank Oz.
creator_credit_for_label: Walt Disney Productions, Jim Henson Productions, Martin G. Baker and Brian Henson
